doc.title: United by Music: How 40 Musicians Conquered the Hearts of Curacao
doc.plot: 40 young Dutch musicians, together with Curacao jazzsinger Izaline Calister, toured around the island of Curacao giving 17 concerts in 5. This documentary gives an overview of performances in many locations and the chemistry between the Dutch musicians and their Caribbean audience. Music styles include classical, jazz, latin and Curacao evergreens.
